Text: I got an E-Mail from acetools.biz about Ace Translator: Software Copyright Violation. What I should do ?
@kmmk13: It must only you who recieved this email.
@kmmk13: Must what? This application is a scam trap and you know it! Thanks for being blackmailed by this stupid company...
sorry kmmk13 i was angry on the uploader. The application is pure shit too. Dont download!!!!
@crilla999 What should I do ? pay or ignore it ?
Ignore it and erase all trace of the program. Don't pay.

@kmmk13: ACE Translator has stolen my identity by hacking my email client and sent the information to the company. I think it is a crime equivalent to copyright infringement so I'm not going to pay. Have read through what others have done to victims of crime and they have regretted that they paid. Delete the program and ignore all future email threats. Never respond to their emails.
